summary: This module implements a VideoFeaturizer component that ingests raw video files, performs necessary preprocessing such as frame extraction, resizing, and normalization, and produces structured feature representations for use in downstream multimodal speech and computer‑vision models.
business_intent: Enable developers to seamlessly incorporate video data into NeMo multimodal pipelines by providing an efficient, reusable preprocessing and feature extraction utility, thereby accelerating the development and deployment of speech‑vision AI applications.
